CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Filtered by Quality Inspection stage positioned above or below the Packaged for Distribution stage?
SRP.A: The Filtered by Quality Inspection stage is positioned {above} the Packaged for Distribution stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Packaged for Distribution?
VE.A: The value of stage Packaged for Distribution is {5390}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Filtered by Quality Inspection?
VE.A: The value of stage Filtered by Quality Inspection is {9221}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Post-Processing?
VE.A: The value of stage Post-Processing is {17726}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Post-Processing, with a value of {17726}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Delivered to Retail, with a value of {4503}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Filtered by Quality Inspection to stage Packaged for Distribution?
SC.A: Decreased by {3831} Tons from stage Filtered by Quality Inspection to stage Packaged for Distribution.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Post-Processing to stage Filtered by Quality Inspection?
SC.A: Decreased by {8505} Tons from stage Post-Processing to stage Filtered by Quality Inspection.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Packaged for Distribution to stage Delivered to Retail?
SC.A: Decreased by {887} Tons from stage Packaged for Distribution to stage Delivered to Retail.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 7305? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Post-Processing} stage has {17726}, the {Filtered by Quality Inspection} stage has {9221}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 7305? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Packaged for Distribution} stage has {5390}, the {Delivered to Retail} stage has {4503}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 4946 and 13473? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Filtered by Quality Inspection} stage has {9221}, the {Packaged for Distribution} stage has {5390}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Packaged for Distribution to Delivered to Retail, or from stage Filtered by Quality Inspection to Packaged for Distribution?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Filtered by Quality Inspection} to {Packaged for Distribution} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Packaged for Distribution to Delivered to Retail, from stage Post-Processing to Filtered by Quality Inspection, or from stage Filtered by Quality Inspection to Packaged for Distribution?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Post-Processing} to stage {Filtered by Quality Inspection} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Post-Processing} and {Filtered by Quality Inspection} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Packaged for Distribution} and {Delivered to Retail} stages.
